title: QBE North America Appoints Kathleen O. Zortman President, Standard Lines - Property & Casualty
content:
SOURCE QBE

NEW YORK 

"Kathleen has a track record of driving profitable growth through underwriting excellence and a strong focus on the customer, which is exactly what QBE is doing here in North America 

Zortman has more than 25 years of experience in the insurance industry, most recently with Fireman's Fund Insurance Company where she served as Chief Field Executive managing a field organization of 1,000 employees and $2.3 billion 

Prior to Fireman's Fund, Zortman held leadership roles at Chubb, Johnson & Higgins and Deloitte Consulting. 

Zortman remarked, "This is a great time to join QBE. With a strong leadership team and true global capacity, QBE is poised for growth. My colleagues and I are committed to consistently delivering underwriting excellence and deepening our producer relationships. I'm excited to take the helm and drive QBE North America's Property & Casualty business to the next level."

Zortman holds a Bachelor of Science in Finance and Marketing from Boston College 

About QBE 

QBE North America is part of QBE Insurance Group Limited, one of the largest insurers and reinsurers worldwide. QBE NA reported Gross Written Premiums in 2014 of $5.3 billion
